frameDefinitions: This frame contains verbs that describe emotional experiences and participate in the locative alternation, as in the following examples: '' ' I was boiling with anger.'
This frame concerns people's knowledge or skill in certain domains.
These words refer to Parts merging to form a Whole.
An Entity changes from a Prior_state to a Post_state in a sequence that follows a pre-defined plan, expectation, or model of change.

A new Employee obtains a Position with an Employer, with which there are certain Tasks associated; in exchange for the performance of these Tasks, the Employee receives Compensation from the Employer.
An Entity (generally food) is exposed to a Heat_source whose Temperature may also be specified.
frameExamples: FE Layer-1: He is an <t>experienced</t> programmer.
The two droplets <t>merge</t>, and then travel down the windowpane even faster.
Their offensive armament has <t>developed</t> from short range missiles to long-range ballistic weaponry in a relatively short period .
I <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> with YouTube to make them a new GUI.
Bacon was <t>frying</t> in the pan, and a great heap of eggs already lay steaming on a plate.
listRoleDefinitions: The Experiencer is the individual that experiences the <fen>Emotion</fen>.

The Emotion experienced (usually restricted to words such as <ment>anger, fury, rage, passion</ment>) can occur as the External Argument or in a PP Complement. Alternatively, there may be no expression of Emotion separate from the target verb:
The words in this frame can occur with an overtly expressed Seat of the Emotion. This frame element occurs as a PP Complement:
The person whose expertise is assessed.
<fen>Skill</fen> identifies the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s talent or ability to do things with one's hand or body.
The area of knowledge (as opposed to a practical skill) in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> 's experience is assessed.
A  product of behavior that shows the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s skill or lack of skill.

This frame element can only occur in place of a skill expression. It refers to the prototypical patient in an action involving the Protagonist. For instance, in the following sentence  the children are experts at some (contextually given) action such as rolling the hoops.

<fex name='Protagonist'>Some children</fex> <m>were</m> <fex name='Degree'>quite</fex> <t>expert</t> <fex name='Focal_participant'>with wooden hoops</fex>.
This frame element denotes a role in which the protagonist has developed his expertise.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has the expertise.
The entities that merge to form a single <fen>Whole</fen>.
The single, undifferentiated entity that is the result of the amalgamation.
The prominent entity that combines with <fen>Part_2</fen> to form a <fen>Whole</fen>.
The less focussed-upon entity that the <fen>Part_1</fen> merges with.
The time at which the <fen>Parts</fen> become amalgamated into a <fen>Whole</fen>
The location at which the amalgamation occurs.
The object that undergoes change.
The time at which the progress occurs.
The location where the Progress occurs.
The person who enters an employment relation with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
The person (or institution) that the <fen>Employee</fen> enters an employment relationship with.
The label given to a particular type of employment.
The action that the <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to do for the <fen>Employer</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when an <fen>Employee</fen> signs on with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Employee</fen> enteres an employment relationship with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
The <fen>Entity</fen> (often a food item)  that absorbs heat.
The <fen>Container</fen> that holds the <fen>Entity</fen> that absorbs the heat.
This role identifies the object that directly supplies heat to the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the heat absorption takes place.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the heat application occurs.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Pat</fex> seethed with rage.
<fex>Rage</fex> boiled inside him.
Fury seethed <fex>within her</fex>.
A skillful <fex>advertising campaign</fex> persuaded voters that his opponent was soft on crime.
His prowess <fex>as a surgeon</fex> is impressive.
They had all just merged <fex>into one big file</fex>.
<fex>The single smaller soul</fex> merges with the Ur-soul.
The single smaller soul merges <fex>with the Ur-soul</fex>.
Advances <fex>in marketing techniques</fex> have since rendered it obsolete.
<fex>When</fex> did the X-wing progress beyond the drawing board?
In spring of 1983, <fex>Tom</fex> signed on at the historic Wawona Hotel in Yosemite National Park, and continues to perform there nightly in the hotel's piano parlor.
He later played for the Scottish Claymores of the NFL Europe League in the spring of 2001, then signed on <fex>with Baltimore</fex> in July of 2001.

In 1973 Franco Acerbis signed on <fex>as a mechanic for the Italian enduro
team</fex>.
In the end, however, Gaskill opted to remain out West and signed on <fex>to play Oscar Marone on CBS's The Bold and the Beautiful</fex>.
Things have been very busy with the new job since I signed on <fex>in June, 2001</fex>.
I had signed on <fex>right there</fex> with the rest of the freaks.
<fex>Bacon</fex> frying in the pan and scenting the air
Five fat sausages were frying <fex>in the pan</fex>
Food was placed to sizzle <fex>on the barbecue </fex>.
<fex>Five minutes ago</fex>the eggs weren't boiling yet.
<fex>In the kitchen</fex> the meat sizzled in the oven and a big pan of potatoes stood on the hob
